actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide for the payment of wife's or husband's insurance benefits (and widow's or widower's insurance benefits in cases of continuous entitlement) without regard to age where the insured individual (on the basis of whose wage record such benefits are payable) is or has been entitled to disability insurance benefits.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides for the payment of wife's or husband's insurance benefits (and widow's or widower's insurance benefits in cases of continuous entitlement) without regard to age where the insured individual (on the basis of whose wage record such benefits are payable) is or has been entitled to disability insurance benefits under title II (Old-Age, Survivors', and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide for the payment of wife's or husband's insurance benefits (and widow's or widower's insurance benefits in cases of continuous entitlement) without regard to age where the insured individual (on the basis of whose wage record such benefits are payable) is or has been entitled to disability insurance benefits.
